mapper.insert: insert into t_solutions(solu_name, designer_id, state, solu_desc, house_id,solu_reserve1,solu_reserve2,solu_reserve3) VALUES (#{soluName},#{design.id},#{state},#{soluDesc},#{houseId},#{soluReserve1},#{soluReserve2},#{soluReserve3})
mapper.select: select solutions.solu_id,solutions.solu_name,solutions.designer_id,solutions.state,solutions.add_time,solutions.solu_desc,solutions.share_sign, room.room_id,room.room_name,room.room_desc, user.id as uid,user.username as uname, pn.product_id,pn.pn_num,pn.pn_id, product.product_id,product.product_name, picture.picture_id,picture.picture_link,picture.picture_name from t_solutions solutions left join t_user user on solutions.designer_id = user.id left join t_room room on room.solu_id=solutions.solu_id left join t_product_num pn on room.room_id = pn.room_id left join t_product product on pn.product_id = product.product_id left join t_picture picture on product.product_id = picture.product_id where solutions.solu_id=#{soluId}

select solu.solu_id,solu.solu_desc,solu.add_time,solu.solu_name,solu.state,solu.solu_reserve1,solu.solu_reserve2,solu.solu_reserve3, design.username as uname,design.mobile as umobile from t_solutions solu,t_house house,t_user design where house.house_id=#{houseId} and house.house_id=solu.house_id and solu.designer_id=design.id and (solu.state='施工完毕' or solu.state='设计完毕' or solu.state='施工中')
